room_title: Escape room "The Theater" by Escape the Room Chicago in Chicago
review: This has been the best escape room I've done so far! I love the level of difficulty of the room that we did and I love how much team work it took. Ive done other rooms but this one really require us to put our head together. The staff was also super frienly and helpful. The clues where clear enough but not so clear to where it wasnt fun. Definitely check it out.

room_title: Escape room "The Theater" by Escape the Room Chicago in Chicago
review: Great place for kids birthday parties!We went there for my sonâ€™s 11th birthday party and had an amazing time. The kids LOVED it!! Highly recommend the puppet theatre theme. They all want to go back. Staff at the Oak Brook location were friendly and helpful and help make the overall experience fun.

room_title: Escape room "The Theater" by Escape the Room Chicago in Chicago
review: Escape Room OakBrook - The TheatreThis was my 1st Escape Room attempt & I LOVED it!!! We've been talking about doing one forever so my friends & I got together to celebrate my Birthday and planned the Escape Room!!! So much FUN...we had a BLAST and are definitely planning another one!!!
